channel.title: [639] Making Summoning Pouches Work (Already have full summoning added) [639]
channel.description:
Okay So I have full summoning in my server. The only thing that's left that I do not have, Is how to make the pouches WORK.
I've added everything, and I just need them to actually summon When you click on summon.
That's pretty much it, Rep and Thanks For Help

item.title: [639] Making Summoning Pouches Work (Already have full summoning added) [639]
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

For one, Im ecstacy Pkz. the one who originally RELEASED Eclipse 639. That was my release.

Secondly, are you the noob that just got on my server asking ME for help with loyalty titles ROFLZ?

AND third, We offer free help here at Moparscape.org, So either offer to help for free (which im sure your incapable of doing) Or leave this thread.
